name: Trade Wars - Economy Simulator
description:
The wars of the 21st century are based on economic dominance and soft power. It no longer matters who has more tanks or guns. Innovation and economic growth rule the world. Lead one of the world's economic giants to spread your trading influence across the planet!

Trade Wars is not only a realistic economic simulator, but also an exciting global strategy game. Capture the markets of all countries of the world with the goods of your country, winning the competition! At the moment, 6 industries are available to you, within which you can become a world leader. Don't get bankrupt, it's a trade war!

- Make agreements with other countries
- Keep track of inflation and unemployment
- Develop technology and science
- Collect taxes and build reserves
- Increase the quality and reduce the cost of your products
- Support your own production
- Impose sanctions against other countries

All this you can try out in a realistic strategy simulation Trade Wars to achieve the prosperity of your country!
